verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> now there was אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Now there was a man [מִבִּן־ ימין כ] (מִבִּנְיָמִ֗ין <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin ק) וּ֠שְׁמוֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name קִ֣ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> [was] Kish בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲבִיאֵ֞ל <S%H22><s%> of Abiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְר֧וֹר <S%H6872><s%> of Zeror בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּכוֹרַ֛ת <S%H1064><s%> of Bechorath בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲפִ֖יחַ <S%H647><s%> of Aphiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man יְמִינִ֑י <S%H3227><s%> right גִּבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> a mighty חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> of power

וְלוֹ־ הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> had בֵ֜ן <S%H1121><s%> And he had a son וּשְׁמ֤וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> [was] Saul בָּח֣וּר <S%H970><s%> a choice young man וָט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and a goodly וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> person מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and [there was] not among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> a goodlier מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> than מִשִּׁכְמ֣וֹ <S%H7926><s%> than he from his shoulders וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward גָּבֹ֖הַּ <S%H1364><s%> [he was] higher מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> than any of the people

וַתֹּאבַ֙דְנָה֙ <S%H6><s%> were lost הָאֲתֹנ֔וֹת <S%H860><s%> And the asses לְקִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> of Kish אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> father שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said קִ֜ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> And Kish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> now one מֵֽהַנְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H5288><s%> of the servants וְק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> with thee and arise לֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go בַּקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲתֹנֹֽת׃ <S%H860><s%> the asses

וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <S%H5674><s%> And he passed through בְּהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mount אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וַיַּעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed through בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> the land שָׁלִ֖שָׁה <S%H8031><s%> of Shalisha וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not מָצָ֑אוּ <S%H4672><s%> but they found וַיַּעַבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> [them] not then they passed through בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> the land שַׁעֲלִים֙ <S%H8171><s%> of Shalim וָאַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> else וַיַּעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> and [there they were] not and he passed through בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> the land יְמִינִ֖י <S%H3227><s%> right וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not מָצָֽאוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> but they found

הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> [And] when they were come בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the land צ֔וּף <S%H6689><s%> of Zuph וְשָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> said לְנַעֲר֥וֹ <S%H5288><s%> to his servant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with לְכָ֣ה <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנָשׁ֑וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> and let us return פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or יֶחְדַּ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> leave אָבִ֛י <S%H1><s%> lest my father מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> about הָאֲתֹנ֖וֹת <S%H860><s%> [caring] for the asses וְדָ֥אַג <S%H1672><s%> and take thought לָֽנוּ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said ל֗וֹ הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> a man אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> unto him Behold now [there is] in this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man נִכְבָּ֔ד <S%H3513><s%> and [he is] an honourable כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> all that he saith בּ֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh יָב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> surely to pass עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now נֵ֣לֲכָה <S%H1980><s%> that we should go שָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אוּלַי֙ <S%H194><s%> perhaps יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> thither peradventure he can shew לָ֔נוּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכֵּ֖נוּ <S%H1870><s%> us our way אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָלַ֥כְנוּ <S%H1980><s%> have set עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul לְנַעֲר֗וֹ <S%H5288><s%> to his servant וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נֵלֵךְ֮ <S%H1980><s%> go וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what נָּבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> what shall we bring לָאִישׁ֒ <S%H376><s%> to the man כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הַלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> bread אָזַ֣ל <S%H235><s%> is spent מִכֵּלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H3627><s%> in our vessels וּתְשׁוּרָ֥ה <S%H8670><s%> and [there is] not a present אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> and there לְהָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> to bring לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> What אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיֹּ֤סֶף <S%H3254><s%> again הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> And the servant לַעֲנ֣וֹת <S%H6030><s%> answered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> Behold I have בְיָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> here at hand רֶ֖בַע <S%H7253><s%> the fourth part שֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> of a shekel כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> [that] will I give לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְהִגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> to tell לָ֖נוּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H1870><s%> us our way

לְפָנִ֣ים ׀ <S%H6440><s%> (Beforetime בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> used אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> thus he spake הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> when a man בְּלֶכְתּוֹ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went לִדְר֣וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to enquire אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God לְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> go עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הָרֹאֶ֑ה <S%H7203><s%> to the seer כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> [called] a Prophet הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for [he that is] now יִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> called לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> was beforetime הָרֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7203><s%> to the seer

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֧וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul לְנַעֲר֛וֹ <S%H5288><s%> to his servant ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Well דְּבָרְךָ֖ <S%H1697><s%> Then said לְכָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1980><s%> come נֵלֵ֑כָה <S%H1980><s%> go וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> unto the city אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> where the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> as they עֹלִים֙ <S%H5927><s%> [And] as they went up בְּמַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> the hill הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> to the city וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> they מָצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> they found נְעָר֔וֹת <S%H5291><s%> young maidens יֹצְא֖וֹת <S%H3318><s%> going out לִשְׁאֹ֣ב <S%H7579><s%> to draw מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> water וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֔ן הֲיֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> unto them Is בָּזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> to them הָרֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7203><s%> is the seer

וַתַּעֲנֶ֧ינָה <S%H6030><s%> And they answered אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> וַתֹּאמַ֥רְנָה <S%H559><s%> them and said יֵּ֖שׁ <S%H3426><s%> He is הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> is see לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> behold [he is] before מַהֵ֣ר ׀ <S%H4116><s%> you make haste עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> to day בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> now for he came לָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> to the city כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for זֶ֧בַח <S%H2077><s%> for [there is] a sacrifice הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people בַּבָּמָֽה׃ <S%H1116><s%> in the high place

כְּבֹאֲכֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> As soon as ye be come הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ye shall straightway תִּמְצְא֣וּן <S%H4672><s%> find אֹת֡וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּטֶרֶם֩ <S%H2962><s%> before יַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> him before he go up הַבָּמָ֜תָה <S%H1116><s%> to the high place לֶאֱכֹ֗ל <S%H398><s%> to eat כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יֹאכַ֤ל <S%H398><s%> will not eat הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> for the people עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּא֔וֹ <S%H935><s%> until he come כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יְבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> because he doth bless הַזֶּ֔בַח <S%H2077><s%> the sacrifice אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> after that כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> they eat הַקְּרֻאִ֑ים <S%H7121><s%> that be bidden וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now עֲל֔וּ <S%H5927><s%> Now therefore get you up כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> כְהַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for about this time תִּמְצְא֥וּן <S%H4672><s%> ye shall find אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> And they went up הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> the city הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> as they בָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> [and] when they were come בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> behold Samuel יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> came out לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <S%H7122><s%> toward לַעֲל֖וֹת <S%H5927><s%> them for to go up הַבָּמָֽה׃ <S%H1116><s%> to the high place ס

וַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Now the LORD גָּלָ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> had told אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣זֶן <S%H241><s%> in his ear שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> a לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before בֽוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> came שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כָּעֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H6256><s%> about this time מָחָ֡ר <S%H4279><s%> To morrow אֶשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> I will send אֵלֶ֨יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thee a man מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וּמְשַׁחְתּ֤וֹ <S%H4886><s%> and thou shalt anoint לְנָגִיד֙ <S%H5057><s%> him [to be] captain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> that he may save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> my people מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> for I have looked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> upon my people כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because בָּ֥אָה <S%H935><s%> is come צַעֲקָת֖וֹ <S%H6818><s%> because their cry אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> when

וּשְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> And when Samuel רָאָ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עָנָ֔הוּ <S%H6030><s%> said הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> unto him Behold the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of whom אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> whom I spake אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This יַעְצֹ֥ר <S%H6113><s%> to thee of this same shall reign בְּעַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> over my people

וַיִּגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> drew near שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> Then Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> to Samuel בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in הַשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> the gate וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said הַגִּֽידָה־ <S%H5046><s%> Tell נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please לִ֔י אֵי־ <S%H335><s%> me I pray thee where זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הָרֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7203><s%> the seer's
